Hello, friends! I'm Coffin Craze, and I specialize in creating unique Coffin Dance Song Covers. Using Adobe After Effects, I put in a lot of time and effort to craft each video.

It's important to note that all my videos adhere to the fair use rules outlined in Section 107 of the Copyright Act, as they contain protected material. I dedicate approximately 4 hours to create these videos, ensuring that my viewers can appreciate the distinction between the original video and my own artistic interpretation.
